channel.title: [PI] Noob friendly - Changing NPC Replies/Text
channel.description:
Hello.
In this guide I will explain in depth how to change NPC chat texts and replies.
Difficulty: 0/10 Knowledge: How to Find and Copy&Paste Base: PI
Firstly
Open your source and navigate to
Source>src>server>models>players>dialoguehandler.java
Next go in-game and talk to the NPC you want to edit.
My example:
He says "Woodcutting" You will then search for that.
Once you have found it, you will edit
[code]case 66: sendNpcChat4("Hello, as you may know im Ed Wood!", "I am a master of woodcutting", "you can cut trees over here", "Good Luck!", c.talkingNpc, "Ed Wood"); c.nextChat = 0; break;[/code]
Case66 Is a case number, it tells the client what case to refer to,
SendNpcChat4 Is telling the source to send 4 lines of text
Then you have each line of text, each line separated by a comma
"Hello, as you may know im Ed Wood!", "this will be the next line"
You get it. Now edit the text inbetween the speech marks. If you have too many letters or it is formatted incorrectly, you will have errors.
Be sure to back up files before editing them to avoid tears.
Message me for any help or request a tutorial.
Louis

item.title: [PI] Noob friendly - Changing NPC Replies/Text
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

RS PS:

A guide for dialogues has been released already.

You don’t say. When I first started I couldnt follow these guides, so i’m creating ones i would’ve been able to.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Noob friendly - Changing NPC Replies/Text
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Hello.

In this guide I will explain in depth how to change NPC chat texts and replies.

Difficulty: 0/10
Knowledge: How to Find and Copy&Paste
Base: PI

Firstly

Open your source and navigate to

Source>src>server>models>players>dialoguehandler.java

Next go in-game and talk to the NPC you want to edit.

My example:

He says “Woodcutting” You will then search for that.

Once you have found it, you will edit

case 66: sendNpcChat4("Hello, as you may know im Ed Wood!", "I am a master of woodcutting", "you can cut trees over here", "Good Luck!", c.talkingNpc, "Ed Wood"); c.nextChat = 0; break;

Case66 Is a case number, it tells the client what case to refer to,

SendNpcChat4 Is telling the source to send 4 lines of text

Then you have each line of text, each line separated by a comma

“Hello, as you may know im Ed Wood!”, “this will be the next line”

You get it. Now edit the text inbetween the speech marks. If you have too many letters or it is formatted incorrectly, you will have errors.

Be sure to back up files before editing them to avoid tears.

Message me for any help or request a tutorial.

Louis
